page.title: 12Public Houses
page.content: Public Houses - The Blacksmiths Arms, North Cowton. Recently sold and renovated into a high class pub and restaurant, inside. The Arden Arms is at Atley Hill, South Cowton, and this year has new owners. All of the pubs have darts and domino matches. Village Halls - N & E Cowton both have good sized halls, which are regularly used for meetings, dances, classes etc. N Cowton hall was refurb- ished in 1984 by Manpower Services. E Cowton hall is now run by comittee, having once being a Church Hall. Various travelling businesses visit the villages. (hairdresser, grocers)
